display.name: Intento
display.description: Intento is a purpose-built blockchain for orchestrating intent-driven actions across IBC-connected chains. It enables secure, self-custodial execution of flows using real-time inputs, Interchain Accounts, and Interchain Queries â€” no smart contracts required. At its core is the intent engine, supported by trustless agents that execute cross-chain actions while keeping flows fully self-custodial. This design allows users and developers to build anything from simple scheduled payments to complex interchain workflows, turning intent into action across the interchain.

widget.title: Submit your intent-based flow
widget.description: Use the Intento Portal to build and execute interchain logic. Submit flows that span time, chains, and conditions.
